participant_1.background:
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
my favorite movie genre is horror.
i am a mother of two.
I value my fitness tracker most of all, because it helps me stay active and healthy.
i do not have a car.

participant_2.background:
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.
I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.
i work in retail.
i traveled around the world in a boat.
i like being by myself.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
That sounds like a lot to deal with, but I'm glad you're doing well! I have anxiety sometimes too, but I'm lucky to have a good support system.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good support system. I'm trying to manage my anxiety with therapy and medication, but it's still a work in progress.
It sounds like you're doing everything you can, which is great! I'm sure you'll be able to manage it in time.
Thanks for the encouragement! It means a lot.
No problem! What's your favorite movie genre?
I love horror movies! They're so exciting and suspenseful.
I love horror movies too! They're my favorite genre.
I don't know if I could pick just one favorite, but The Conjuring is definitely one of them.
The Conjuring is a great movie! I love the atmosphere and the scares.
I'm glad you like it! It's one of my favorites.
